channel.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
channel.description: In HL2, when you take the first teleporter, you can clearly see Lamarr jump in and get teleported to a beach. Later in the game, when you take the teleporter Mossman was working on(when you arrive at Kleiners lab, and tell you it's been a week), Lamarr is there! How?

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Shnazliztur
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

It would be awesome if the Half-Life series started to have a running gag where Lamar keeps getting teleported/shot/various transportation into far off places just to return the next game without any explanation.

Yeah, kinda like how Kenny keeps dying in every episode of southpark but hes magically alive again the next episode.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: DrGonzo
item.description:
Kliener hit the reverse button on his teleporter and tele’d him back.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
Maverix26:

Are you guys all dimwits?
She fought through waves of combines and other baddies, 'til she got home (with the help oof the crowbar she found l
aying around). She hijacked copters, buggy’s and gunships, and eventually made it back. When she returned, kleiner found new love, in the form of a zombine. She couldn’t take the awkwardness, so she jumped into the rocket in ep. 2 and killed herself. Thread complete, move on.

p.columbo:

Someone should make this into a movie.

or a game

Read full topic

Kleiner calls Lamarr for a she since he is never going to get a real girl

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Randombine
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

Lamarr could have ended up back at Kleiner’s lab at the same time as Gordon. She (do Headcrabs have genders?)

I don’t think they have genders because they don’t have “Sex” They grow into a Gonarch, I think once they reach that stage they don’t need to mate to have kids.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
One funny thing when you see Lamarr after the combine portal is that she backs off, and dissapears, I haven’t found her anywhere in the lab. If anyone knows where she went, please tell me. :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
we can’t know how she turned back but surelly 1 of the causes is because she did not want to get trapped inside a combine pod…

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
Just to correct you, Lamarr wasn’t teleported to a beach, it was a desert. You can noclip there from the chapter ‘Red Letter Day’, I have been playing around there a lot, just like I have in the end of Portal, at the outside of the Aperture Facility. But I think Lamarr found her way back to Dr. Kleiner, there is a hard as hell game on newgrounds.com named Lamarr is going home where you actually play as Lamarr, I only got to the third level, but I suspect that you eventualy come to Dr. Kleiners lab. :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: therandus
item.description:
jerry:

In HL2, when you take the first teleporter, you can clearly see Lamarr jump in and get teleported to a beach.
Later in the game, when you take the teleporter Mossman was working on(when you arrive at Kleiners lab, and tell you it’s been a week), Lamarr is there!
How?

well if that puzzles you then you better not hope they put lamar in episode 3 otherwise explaining how she gets back after being launched into space will be one heck of an explanation.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Lukagerm
item.description:
Kleiner used his science to bring Hedy back to the lab (because he likes Hedy more) and left you to be teleported into Breen’s office etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
gordenfreemanzomg:

Heres what happend.Lamarr Did get teleported but Then she found her way back to klieners lab (It is unknown how Lamarr found he Way back to klieners lab) But rebels Do know Lamarr So possibly Helped her? (Any ways if Lammar stayed with gordon while he teleported again she would of die because you teleport in the water and water kills headcrabs)

do you think the rebels are going to stop shooting a headcrab to see if it’s lamarr? they all look the same even I would have shooted lamarr if I had a gun back in hl2 before kleiner explained me that she could not do any damage to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
I’d like to point out that a crow got teleported into the lab after Freeman came back the first time, and it wasn’t even in the group of matter teleported from the lab; it’s also possible Lamarr was teleported to different locations than Gordon was after the initial teleport to the wasteland and was maybe teleported back into the first section of the lab when Gordon was deposited outside the lab.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Slunket
item.description:
Hoffman501:

That’s exactly like in BioShock, after you kill Andrew Ryan immediately upon exiting his office, is a Vita-Chamber, which for people who have played BioShock, were created specifically so he and his relatives could respawn if they ever “died”

I dont see how thats anything like this at all.

Read full topic

item.description:
Heres what happend.Lamarr Did get teleported but Then she found her way back to klieners lab (It is unknown how Lamarr found he Way back to klieners lab) But rebels Do know Lamarr So possibly Helped her? (Any ways if Lammar stayed with gordon while he teleported again she would of die because you teleport in the water and water kills headcrabs)

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Mighty gruesome for a kid’s song but who am I to complain…

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
Dias:

I know that’s what happens because i’ve used noclip, but I didn’t think it was actually possible to squeeze in through the door & see it without cheating.

You can’t see her actually disappearing, but I think you can get through fast enough that it would have been impossible for her to hide within the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: OJJ09874
item.description:
m4rek:

Have none of you ever heard that song?

https://www.kididdles.com/lyrics/c020.html
Song and lyrics available here…

I haven’t heard this particular version, but for a children’s song I’d like to point out this verse?

The atom bomb fell just the other day,
The H-Bomb fell in the very same way;
Russia went, England went, and then the U.S.A.
The human race was finished without a chance to pray.

(chorus)
But the cat came back the very next day…

Or the music video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bETCusT5kNM

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Pettifogg:

Also, immediately after this scene, Lamarr ducks behind the door again, and if you quickly run through it immediately after you can see that she’s disappeared. As I said, Lamarr is not bound by conventional physics.

I know that’s what happens because i’ve used noclip, but I didn’t think it was actually possible to squeeze in through the door & see it without cheating.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Zerego
item.description:
mechaelite:

In theory it was hl2 beta ravenholm’s lake. Quote from combine overwiki:

Yeah, but that was after they were teleported to the Wasteland, where Lamarr jumped off.

Read full topic

item.description:
Have none of you ever heard that song?

https://www.kididdles.com/lyrics/c020.html

I haven’t heard this particular version, but for a children’s song I’d like to point out this verse?

The atom bomb fell just the other day,

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

It would be awesome if the Half-Life series started to have a running gag where Lamar keeps getting teleported/shot/various transportation into far off places just to return the next game without any explanation.

This. :awesome:

Also, immediately after this scene, Lamarr ducks behind the door again, and if you quickly run through it immediately after you can see that she’s disappeared. As I said, Lamarr is not bound by conventional physics.

Read full topic

item.title: Wasn't Lamarr Teleported?
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
I don’t think it was “inside out” so much as “not put back together correctly”.
